content: Henning Giese is a postdoctoral researcher at Paderborn University (Germany). His work examines multidimensional aspects of taxation with an emphasis on tax departments, tax complexity, and fiscal policy. He studies how organizational choices shape the design and performance of tax departments, what drives tax complexity and its consequences, and how tax policy influences firm behaviorâ€”such as compliance, risk-taking, and the green transition.
title: Henning Giese
